item.title: Pending transactions, ABI decoding uniswap in golang
item.description: This is really a blog post adding more description and explanation of my uniswap-tui repo and I go a bit fast.

item.title: Moving On
item.description: Longer story, context I joined the harmony blockchain project around August 2019 and within two months, I was coding core protocol work.
